InstructionData.Instructions:
### Gas Management - Europa ### alias GasIC db alias WasteTank d0 alias WasteToggle d1 alias HabSensor d2 alias HabToggle d3 alias OxygenSensor d4 alias OxygenToggle d5
alias GasTemp r0 alias HabTemp r1 alias OxygenTemp r2
define HabTargetTemp 293.15 # 20C define GasTargetTemp 298.15 # 25C
Start: yield l GasTemp WasteTank Temperature l HabTemp HabSensor Temperature l OxygenTemp OxygenSensor Temperature s GasIC Setting HabTemp bdseal HabToggle HandleHab bdseal WasteToggle HandleCooling bdseal OxygenToggle HandleOxygen j Start
HandleHab: blt HabTemp HabTargetTemp doHeatHab j stopHeatHab
HandleOxygen: blt OxygenTemp HabTargetTemp doHeatOxygen j stopHeatOxygen
HandleCooling: bgt GasTemp GasTargetTemp doCooling j stopCooling
doHeatHab: s HabToggle On 1 j ra
stopHeatHab: s HabToggle On 0 j ra
doCooling: s WasteToggle On 1 j ra
stopCooling: s WasteToggle On 0 j ra
doHeatOxygen: s OxygenToggle On 1 j ra
stopHeatOxygen: s OxygenToggle On 0 j ra
